newsitem.title: USA: Computer Generated files for offering.
newsitem.headline: Computer Generated files for offering.

text.p: Computer Generated Solutions Inc said on Wednesday it has filed a registration statement with the Securities and Exchange Commission relating to an initial public offering of 3,540,000 shares.
The offering includes 2,900,000 shares to be sold by the company and 640,000 shares to be sold by selling stockholders, Computer Generated said.
The offering will be managed by Oppenheimer & Co Inc and Furman Selz, the company said.
Proceeds will be used to repay certain of the company's indebtedness, fund distributions to shareholders for the period it was an S corporation and for general corporate purposes, the company said.
